title: Taiwan defence minister pushes new arms spending, says China tensions worst in four decades
content:
1. Taiwan defence minister pushes new arms spending, says China tensions worst in four decades  Reuters
  2. Gravitas: 56 Chinese Jets invade Taiwan's airspace  WION
  3. Biden says he and China's Xi agree to abide by Taiwan agreement  Reuters
  4. Chinese warplanes fly toward Taiwan and alarm the U.S. But the display is only symbolic.  NBCNews.com
  5. Worried About China and the US, Japan Is Again Becoming a World Power  Bloomberg
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

Chinese warplanes fly toward Taiwan and alarm the U.S. But the display is only symbolic.  NBCNews.com

localize.title: 台湾国防相、新たな武器支出を推進、中国との緊張は過去40年間で最悪と発表
台湾国防部长推动新的军备开支，称中国的紧张局势是四十年来最严重的
臺灣國防部長推動新的軍備開支，稱中國的緊張局勢是四十年來最嚴重的
